name: Magical Horse: Animal Simulator 2017
description:
Become a horse in Magical Horse: Animal Simulator 3D!

Try how to be a magic animal in horse survival simulator. Complete funny quests and upgrade your horse to open new survival skills. Explore the magic locations and fight for your survival. Find an animal mate and breed a new magic horse. Get a horse herd, it is important for your survival: there are many animal species in the survival simulator. Have your own magic animal, that you can feed, ride and play with!

Features of Magical Horse: Animal Simulator 3D!

- 3D graphics
- Survival atmosphere
- Animal behaviour simulator
- Magic horse herds
- Many animal species
- Survival and quests

Ride a horse across magic simulator's lands, adventures are waiting for your survival! Sneak into every corner. Fight with every animal you meet or run. Survival is not easy for animal, so maintain your magic horse energy in the simulator. Upgrade your animal and finish all quests - in the survival simulator they can be challenging, but funny.

Magic horse in the simulator is better than real animal! Real horse can't beat a giant bear, can't help people in the village and beat a wizard. But your animal can do it in our survival simulator! Don't wait! Listen to the nature, deep into magic horse life and survival. Never played animal simulator games? Hold your magic horse! Try our simulator right now. There are tutorial and smooth animal controls inside. Learn how to run and challenge friends.

Avoid big dragons or find how to use magic against them. Even cute animals can be dangerous in the survival simulator. Finish quests, help your magic horse friend to be a hero. Try it, 3D graphics makes the animal survival simulator even more interesting!

Ride, fight and enjoy Magical Horse: Animal Simulator 3D!
